Name: Island Elf
About the game: The whole game takes you to experience living with the elves in the island villa from a first-person perspective. During your life, you can interact with the elf in various ways, watch the elf swim, chat about intimate topics, make her dance naked, and help her take a bath. The longer you live with the elves, the higher the elves' favorability for you. When the favorability reaches a certain level, other different scenes can be unlocked, such as the rooftop and the living room. Every time a scene is switched, the interactive content will also change. What is the specific change, waiting for you to explore! Game Features The game has set a time system, and the sky will change automatically with time. Of course, you can also actively adjust the time. For example, when the 'H' event occurs with the wizard, it can be adjusted to the time period you like. The camera angle can be adjusted in various ways, allowing you to interact with the sprite from the angle you like. Various scenes, more interactions are waiting for you to unlock!
